title: Daybees Event Finder
creator: Daybees - The World's Largest Event Search Engine

extendedInfo.description: (Currently UK Model)Daybees is a vertical search engine listing events and only events. You Google for information; you'll Daybees for events.With our app you can easily find all events happening in your area for the whole of the UK (other countries are planned soon). The up-to-date events database includes more than 1.5 million events organized in 230 categories including cultural, family, sport, and music, presented in a neat and concise way. Find what to do and add it to your personal calendar within Daybees.â¢ The Largest Event-Only Search Engine In The World.â¢ All Events Add to Calendar.â¢ Search. Browse. Discover. Find. Add. Share. Do. Be.â¢ Search for any event from big to small - Results are always events.â¢ Search by 'Near Me', Keyword, any Location (from country to postcode), any Date or Date Range, and over 200 categories.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Having a four year old I\'m always looking to see what\'s happening locally, this will make life a lot easier :-)
reviews.author: Gavin Shropshire

reviews.title: A good, useful app
reviews.comment: Helpful app. Found events that are going to be going on that I didn\'t know about. One feature request, the ability to post to Google calendar rather than the in app calendar.
reviews.author: Jim Wall

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: I\'ve given this 3 based on potential and initial options. On my HTC One X, I cannot access any event data if I set the location to Near Me or Distance as a filter. And every search throws the error \"Error in invocation of web service\" - I\'m addition, the app is a little too dark, perhaps white and yellow instead? The \"Register\" feature also doesn\'t work (note, I didn\'t try the Facebook option) - and generally it could use a little aesthetic work.  That said  I see excellent potential! Keep it up!
reviews.author: Joseph Brailsford

reviews.title: Good content, still a bit clunky
reviews.comment: Having just moved to a new city it\'s great to have so much content for events.  However, there is still some way to go with this app.  I previously logged in to the web version with my LinkedIn profile but the mobile app version doesn\'t allow this so I had to create a new profile - which it then said was invalid but let me log in anyway!  I am sure they will sort this stuff out. Congrats for getting so much entertainment in one place especially for places other than London.  Well done and keep up the good work!  Wants: ability to store location and date preferences (\"near me\" doesn\'t work.. near me!), better calendar synchronisation etc
reviews.author: Howard Gannaway

reviews.title: Good potentual
reviews.comment: Same errors as below and I don\'t like the old fashioned loading symbol, but this app will be great when the bugs are ironed out.
reviews.author: Conny Watts

reviews.title: Cannot recommend. As explained by other reviewers...
reviews.comment: Cannot access info on any events. This time tested on a non-galaxy device. Get the invocation error described by others
reviews.author: Duarte Molha

reviews.title: big surprise
reviews.comment: Application works as I expected. Highly recommend. As simple as need
reviews.author: Petr Poho\305\231elsk\303\275

reviews.title: Nice :-)
reviews.comment: Works fine for me on Galaxy S2 - and thanks to BBC Click for recommending this app :-)
reviews.author: Tim O\'Malley

reviews.title: Exception occurred...
reviews.comment: \"Exception occurred during invocation of Web service\" error popping up regularly. Happy to score again when it works. - Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Wayne Meade

reviews.title: No results
reviews.comment: No events returned no matter what criteria used.  This includes criteria which returns plenty of results on the website version.
reviews.author: Peter Ball

reviews.title: Perfect. Highly recommend.
reviews.comment: I use it on LG Nexus
reviews.author: Mateusz WISLA

reviews.title: Not worth the wait. ..
reviews.comment: Lag time for loading results is ridiculously long.  In fact,  I gave up waiting after 3 min and several searches in various cities.  Uninstalled today.
reviews.author: Michelle Sladinski

reviews.title: Won\'t find anything on
reviews.comment: This app won\'t find anything (using various search terms) when filtering near me. Not much use
reviews.author: Neil Rodgers

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Simply doesn\'t work on an S3. My S3 isn\'t faulty... The app is!!!
reviews.author: Ronnie Pye

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: Won\'t search for events locally so disappointing sort it out please
reviews.author: Jake Lewis
